alert.note: Alert for Plymouth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 9:51PM CST until December 13 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa and east central, south central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Isolated power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. The hazardous conditions could impact Tuesday morning`s commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing drizzle continues this evening. Freezing rain will develop after midnight. As temperatures warm Tuesday morning freezing rain will change to rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
